title: Ice Boomerang
summaries: The Ice Boomerang is a melee weapon found in Frozen Chests in the Ice biome, as well as from Frozen and Boreal Crates. It behaves like a regular boomerang, but it is faster and emits light which can be used in dark areas and also has a chance to inflict the Frostburn debuff. It is similar to the Enchanted Boomerang, dealing slightly more damage, but lacking the Flamarang upgrade.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 21 / 16 / 14 (Melee)
statistics.Critical chance: 6% / 4%
statistics.Use time: 20 (Very fast) / 15 (Very fast)
statistics.Sell: 1
